text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The model explains the requirements of actual occupation in plain language by discussing the concept of 'actual occupation' in the context of overriding interests (Schedule 3, Paragraph 2 of the LRA 2002) and contrasting it with the requirements for adverse possession (factual possession, intention to possess, without consent). It clearly states that physical presence matters and that the 6-month absence is damaging to the argument of actual occupation at the time of purchase. This addresses the core concept of what constitutes 'actual occupation' for legal protection.", "criterion_id": "5156a743-0fc5-43be-919c-2246befabacf"}
